Entry.de: {CHARACTER-SUBJECT} wurde aus dem Kerker entlassen. Voller Dankbarkeit für {masculine_CHARACTER-SUBJECT:seine:ihre} Freiheit zeigt {masculine_CHARACTER-SUBJECT:er:sie} sich dazu bereit, {masculine_CHARACTER-SUBJECT:seinen:ihren} Groll Euch gegenüber zu vergessen.

Entry.ja: {CHARACTER-SUBJECT}が牢獄から解放された。再び自由になれたことに感謝し、{masculine_CHARACTER-SUBJECT:彼:彼女}は{masculine_CHARACTER-SUBJECT:彼:彼女}に対するあなたの過去の侮辱行為を許した。

Entry.ru: {CHARACTER-SUBJECT} {masculine_CHARACTER-SUBJECT:освобожден:освобождена} из тюрьмы. Радуясь вновь обретенной свободе, {masculine_CHARACTER-SUBJECT:он простил:она простила} ваши прегрешения.
Entry.zh-CN: {CHARACTER-SUBJECT}已获释，且对重获自由心怀感激，{masculine_CHARACTER-SUBJECT:他:她}已忘了你过去对{masculine_CHARACTER-SUBJECT:他的:她的}冷落。

Entry.en-US: {CHARACTER-SUBJECT} has been released from prison, but harbors a bitter resentment against you for {masculine_CHARACTER-SUBJECT:his:her} imprisonment.

Entry.ru: {CHARACTER-SUBJECT} {masculine_CHARACTER-SUBJECT:освобожден:освобождена} из тюрьмы, но {CHARACTER-SUBJECT} {masculine_CHARACTER-SUBJECT:затаил:затаила} на вас злобу после своего заточения.

Entry.en-US: {CHARACTER-SUBJECT} has been released from prison and has not been shy about complaining of {masculine_CHARACTER-SUBJECT:his:her} unjust imprisonment.

Entry.fr: Vos efforts pour capturer {CHARACTER-SUBJECT} ont porté leurs fruits. {masculine_CHARACTER-SUBJECT:Il s’est rendu:Elle s’est rendue} et est maintenant en captivité.

Entry.en-US: {CHARACTER-SUBJECT} refused to surrender to the party you sent to capture {masculine_CHARACTER-SUBJECT:him:her}, choosing death over captivity.

Entry.de: {CHARACTER-SUBJECT} verweigerte Eurem Suchtrupp die Kapitulation und entschied sich statt der Gefangenschaft für den Freitod.

Entry.ja: {CHARACTER-SUBJECT}は、捕縛のためにあなたが派遣した部隊への降伏を拒否し、捕虜として拘束されることよりも死を選んだ。
